nan_interpolation

apply_filter_to_array_with_nans_multidim

larvaworld.lib.aux.nan_interpolation.apply_filter_to_array_with_nans_multidim(a, freq, fr, N=1)[source]

Power-spectrum of signal.

Compute the power spectrum of a signal and its dominant frequency within some range.

Parameters:

  • a (array) -- 1D,2D or 3D Array : the array of timeseries to be filtered

  • freq (float) -- The cut-off frequency to set for the butter filter

  • fr (float) -- The framerate of the dataset

  • N (int) -- order of the butter filter

Returns:

yf -- Filtered array of same shape as a

Return type:

array
